09172f273296da11fb8c85b65b9c0e22 (07:34): purefusion, ok... here: """""" This code sets the background color of one child, the sixth item, to red:   ul:nth-child(6){background-color: red;} """
c191a0a89c262a71d9f04c459446f999 (07:35): Zoffix: :nth-child(N) { IE 6: N | IE 7: N | Firefox 1.5: N | Opera 9: N } http://www.webdevout.net/browser_support_css.php#support-css3pseudoclasses-nthchild

09172f273296da11fb8c85b65b9c0e22 (07:36): purefusion, """""" ul:nth-child(2n+1){background-color: red;}  This translates to ‚ÄúGroup the children (the li elements within the list in thiscase) by twos (2n). """""""
